channel.title: Shop help
channel.description:
Umm help please i added a shop and did everything added it shows up but when i trade with it it d/cs me help and this is what i have
Autospawn
[code]spawn = 569 2872 3584 0 0 0 0 0 1 Silver_ Merchant[/code]
client.java
[code]} else if (NPCID == 569) { //Silver_Merchant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 48; //Silver_Merchant[/code]
and in shops i have
[code]shop = 48 Silver_ Merchant 1 1 6609 99999 6611 99999 6617 99999 6623 99999 6625 99999 6633 99999 1038 99999 1040 99999 1042 99999 1044 99999 1046 99999 1048 99999 1053 99999 1055 99999 1057 99999 1961 99999 1959 99999 1037 99999 1077 99999 1125 99999 1165 99999 1195 99999 1313 99999 1327 99999[/code]

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

u know at the top it wil saying like

//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount

you have to make sure this goes to where the shop number is so like
//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount
shop = 48 Silver_ Merchant 1 1 6609 99999 6611 99999 6617 99999 6623 99999 6625 99999 6633 99999 1038 99999 1040 99999 1042 99999 1044 99999 1046 99999 1048 99999 1053 99999 1055 99999 1057 99999 1961 99999 1959 99999 1037 99999 1077 99999 1125 99999 1165 99999 1195 99999 1313 99999 1327 99999

this is not the corect tabing but u get the idea

Read full topic
